page.title: 12Droylsden Carnival
page.content: The carnival happens once a year in Droylsden. Carnivals happen all over the North West in towns and cities. These festivities are to raise money for charities in the local area.Queens Princesses and Rosebuds that have been selected for their town dress up cars and put them in the carnival parade. They win prizes for the best dressed Queen's,Princess's and Rosebud's car. When the parade has finished they all go on to the arena where they smile and curtsey to some judges. In the arena the new Queen,Princess and Rosebud are crowned and the old Queen, Princess and Rosebud go into their retiring year. There is usually a fairground where people go after the arena judging to meet their friends. After a long, tiring day they all go home and take the flowers their cars ready for the next carnival.
